comments.author: Greg
comments.body: I'm up for Flag. See you at noon.

comments.author: Matt
comments.body: I am still down one road bike after my crash last Thursday. Performance said they should have it fixed by this evening. Tomorrow looks good for a ride, though. In the meantime I'm headed over to the Rec Center to lift.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Don't tell my doctor... I was caught heading up Flag today by Frenz Greg and Kevin. Ist strictly verboten while I'm taking Coumadin. I think I'm okay though, considering how s-l-o-w I come back down. And how thick my skull is. Besides, who knows more about risk; me or my doctor?
